body:
No one is worthy of a good home here or in heaven that is not willing to be in peril for a good cause.
Happiness never lays its finger on its pulse.
I asked God for all things , that I might enjoy life. God gave life, that I might enjoy all things.
Our hours in love have wings in absence, crutches.
Adversity makes men, and prosperity makes monsters.
What whiskey will not cure, there is no cure for.
The last thing one discovers in composing a work is what to put first.
Living with a saint is more grueling than being one.
Adversity reveals genius, prosperity conceals it.
Most people who ask for advice from others have already resolved to act as it pleases them.
As I grow older, I pay less attention to what people say. I just watch what they do.
No great artist ever sees things as they really are, if he did he would cease to be an artist.
You see few people here in America who really care very much about living a Christian life in a democratic world.
An aphorism can never be the whole truth it is either a half-truth or a truth-and-a-half.
Men's actions are too strong for them. Show me a man who has acted, and who has not been the victim and slave of his action.
The human race afraid of nothing, rushes on through every crime.
My ancestors didn't come over on the Mayflower, but they were there to meet the boat.
Character is the sum and total of a person's choices.
I don't believe in accidents. There are only encounters in history. There are no accidents.
